casebody.data:
Raymond R. SMITH, Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
Citizens Insurance Company of America, Intervening Plaintiff,
v.
CHRYSLER GROUP, LLC, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157382
COA: 339705 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 11, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellant to extend the time for filing his reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before May 23, 2018.
